summary: I RECEIVED A RECALL LETTER #17V224 ON MY KIA. I RECENTLY TOOK IT BACK TO THE KIA DEALSHIP I LEASED IT FROM AND SERVICE DEPARTMENT RAN A TEST ON IT AND CHANGED THE OIL WHICH WAS CHANGED IN APRIL. I WAS ADVISE I NEED TO BUY A CABIN AIR FILTER OF $60.00. WHICH I CAN'T AFFORD BECAUSE I'M ON SHORT TERM ON MY JOB.I HAVE COMPLAIN ABOUT RATTLE NOISE FROM THE ENGINE AND SOUNDS FROM THE BEARING OR AXLE. I LATELY BEEN HAVING PROBLEMS WITH AIR BLOWING AND ONLY ONE AUX PLUG WORK. I ALWAYS HAVING TO GET TIRES FIX AND AIRED UP. MY SISTER WAS KILLED LAST YEAR IN A SUV THAT HAD A RECALL ON IT SAME AS MY KIA DOES AND THIS KINDY HAVE ME NERVOUS OF DRIVING MY KIA BUT THIS IS MY ONLY TRANSPORTATION. I ASKING FOR ANY HELP TO RESOLVE THIS I MAKE MY PAYMENTS AND NEED A RELIABLE RIDE FOR ME AND MY KIDS AND MOTHER.
